trans-unit.source: Represents the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A biztonsági beállításokat adja meg a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class is designed for interoperation with services that implement WS-* specifications.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>osztály, amely implementálja a WS - szolgáltatásokkal való együttműködés készült * specifikációk.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The transport security for this binding is Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) over HTTP, or HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: A kötéshez a transport biztonsági Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) HTTP vagy HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets the message-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a kötés üzenet szintű biztonsági beállításait.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: The default value includes: <xref:System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp.EstablishSecurityContext*> with default set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The default value includes: <>*> with default set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, <>*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>, <>*> is <>*>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*></xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the message <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Megadja az üzenetet <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>Ehhez a kötéshez.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> and/or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property buckets may or may not become effective.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság határozza meg, hogy a beállítások a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>és/vagy <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message%2A>tulajdonság gyűjtők is, vagy előfordulhat, hogy nem érvénybe.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>Ehhez a kötéshez.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of the Mode set is not defined.
trans-unit.target: A mód beállítása értéke nincs definiálva.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Visszaadja egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*>tulajdonság alapértelmezett értéke megváltozott, és kell szerializálni.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Ezt használja a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] az XAML-integráció.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*>tulajdonság értéke kell lennie, mivel a szerializált; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Visszaadja egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*>tulajdonság alapértelmezett értéke megváltozott, és kell szerializálni.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.target: Ezt használja a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] az XAML-integráció.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*>tulajdonság értéke kell lennie, mivel a szerializált; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Visszaadja egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*>tulajdonság alapértelmezett értéke megváltozott, és kell szerializálni.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*>tulajdonság értéke kell lennie, mivel a szerializált; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: A kötés átviteli szintű biztonsági beállításait tartalmazó objektum beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: You can use the object returned by this property to set the transport security settings for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság által visszaadott objektum segítségével az átvitel a kötés biztonsági beállításainak megadása.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>Ehhez a kötéshez.</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The default value includes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType> and a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték tartalmaz egy <> </> *> a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>és egy <> </> *> a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>
